macrohybrid: Corrects for shift-type camera shake, which typically occurs in macro (close-up) shooting.
smartshutter: The camera automatically takes the photo when people smile, wink, or get into frame.
creativefilters: This setting provides easy access to special filter effects and scene modes, such as Toy Camera Effect, Poster Effect, Monochrome and more.
dynamic: Effective for video shooting at wide-angle focal lengths, eliminating the unwanted shaking that typically occurs while walking.
highdynamicrange: The camera combines three different exposures to get one evenly lit image.
aperturepriority: You set the aperture, controlling depth-of-field. The camera automatically selects the shutter speed.
portrait: The camera sets a large aperture, focusing the subject and artistically blurring the background to make your subject âpop.â
custom: Define and store your own settings to achieve the effects you prefer.
underwater: Capture underwater images with reduced backscatter effect. Optional Underwater Case required.
powered: Compensates for hand movement when shooting video at the telephoto end of the zoom range, where camera shake is magnified.
superslowmotionmovie: Record your clips in high speed (approx. 240 fps), and then watch your videos in slow motion.
movie: Record video in stereo sound. Unwanted scenes can be deleted in playback mode.
snow: Shoot clear snow scenes without darkened subjects or an unnatural bluish tint.
nostalgic: Create the look and feel of old photographs using sepia tones and black-and-white.
highspeedbursthq: Captures fast-action shots at full sensor resolution, by shooting continuously when the shutter button is held down.
program: Access advanced exposure compensation features while shooting mostly automatically.
panning: Panning motion is detected so that IS does not interfere with desired camera movement.
handheldnightscene: Take clear and steady pictures at night without the use of a tripod.
normal: Corrects for a wide range of camera movement when shooting stills.
fireworks: Grab brilliant images of skyrocketing fireworks.
tripod: When tripod use is detected, the Image Stabilizer is stopped because it is not needed.
smartauto: The camera automatically selects the best shooting settings for optimal quality based on subjects and environmental factors to provide point-and-shoot simplicity.
iframemovie: The AppleÂ® movie format, iFrame, makes it easier and quicker to import and upload videos while retaining high image quality.
supervivid: Super Vivid intensifies existing hues, saturating the scene with bright colors.
manual: You have complete control of exposure, selecting both aperture and shutter speed manually.
softfocus: Creates a hazy ambiance thatâs perfect for portraits and wedding photos.
supportedflashmemory: SD Memory Card, SDHC Memory Card, SDXC Memory Card
shutterpriority: You select the shutter speed to stop or blur action, and the camera finds the appropriate aperture. With slow exposure times, Canon's noise reduction system activates to ensure low image noise.
